FeatureData.title: 1,00000 transactions per
FeatureData.para: Implement the best platform to provide higher TPS. The higher the TPS is providing the better trading experiences.

FeatureData.title: Custom User
FeatureData.para: We provide you a totally custom User interface which will be only developed for your exchange and own the rights for that user interface.

FeatureData.title: Powerful Trade Match
FeatureData.para: Meet our powerful trade engine which helps you to match real time orders and use machine learning to trade to the orders superfast.

FeatureData.title: Highly Secured
FeatureData.para: The exchange developed by us is protected with highly secure firewalls.

FeatureData.title: Multi-layer
FeatureData.para: We develop an exchange with additional security layers- SSL implementation, two-factor authentication. It assures a limit for fund withdrawals, fraud prevention, secure login, and encrypted user access.

FeatureData.title: Automatic
FeatureData.para: We use Our Advance KYC Tools for verify user details to make sure it will help you complete your exchange due diligence with a hustle free process.

FeatureData.title: Bot-enabled Support
FeatureData.para: Provide customer support to your customers with the bot enabled support centre which use machine learning to answer the support enquiries seamless

FeatureData.title: Referral and Reward
FeatureData.para: The implementation of a reward & referrals program enables the accurate distribution of rewards and commissions.
